title.rendered: Board of Education Holds Annual Organizational Meeting

content.rendered:
The Saratoga Springs Board of Education conducted an annual organizational meeting on July 7, 2025.

During the meeting, Ashley Fogarty, Natalya Lakhtakia, and Leigh Wilton took the oath of office to serve three-year terms as Board of Education members.  Additionally, the board elected Natalya Lakhtakia to serve as president and Beth Braxton to serve as vice president of the Board of Education for the 2025-2026 school year. 

To stay informed about Board of Education meetings, visit the Board of Education section of the website.
